essential-features.title: Admin Automation.
essential-features.message: We streamline your administrative tasks with automation tools.

essential-features.title: Ai Learning.
essential-features.message: We provide AI learning solutions to enhance student intelligence and their learning engagement.

essential-features.title: Online presence.
essential-features.message: We establish and enhance your online presence through various digital platforms including building a website for your school.

basic-package.title: Basic package
basic-package.message: Get started with essential tools to streamline administrative tasks and enhance learning outcomes.

essential-package.title: Essential package.
essential-package.message: Enhance efficiency with advanced reporting, communication portals, and attendance tracking.

advanced-package.title: Advanced package.
advanced-package.message: Unlock the full potential of your institution with custom solutions, LMS integration, and AI-powered analytics.
